>
[Wand of Mercy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2283)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The pommel of this rose quartz wand resembles the stylized wings of an angel. When you cast its spell and choose not to make it [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), the crystal deepens to blood red. The color reverts to rose when you cast the spell from the wand nonlethally.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell; the activation takes <actions string="Two Actions" /> if the spell normally takes <actions string="Single Action" /> to cast, or <actions string="Three Actions" /> if the spell normally takes <actions string="Two Actions" />;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You Cast the Spell, and can choose to give it the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate rank. The spell must have a casting time of <actions string="Single Action" /> or <actions string="Two Actions" />, it must deal damage, it must deal damage, and it can’t have the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661), or [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510) traits.
